@ttalkertwalker @Stuck4ger @FAANews @virgingalactic ... and if fired and barred from the company with no recourse to talk internally anymore, then I see no reason for a pilot to not bring the discourse to the public instead; especially on a vehicle billed to be a future public passenger one. The kinks must be ironed out.

@ttalkertwalker @Stuck4ger @FAANews @virgingalactic A pilot's honor compels them to run things at the utmost safety, and speak vocally when things appear to be wrong. Mark was in the cockpit of SS2 for years, if he smells something wrong its likely because something IS wrong.

-Open to the public
-Salary: $134,400 to $189,100
-Closes on 9/7/21 https://t.co/SB8z6wnkPU
